name: One Gray Maze
description:
PLAY IN FULLSCREEN also play as a Smiley Circle as she tries to guide a marble through a gray maze! She can make the marble circle her like a planet but only for a short amount of time before she drops it! Can you make it to the end?

The mouse is the only thing you need to play this game properly with extra quality of life stuff attached to keyboard buttons like pausing or changing the music.

CONTROLS:

Left click pivots the marble around you

Right click releases the marble from orbit

Scroll Wheel moves the camera up/down/left/right depending of it's current scrolling type

Clicking the Scroll Wheel changes the type of scrolling


This was made for the Game Maker's Toolkit 2019... but I didn't post it in time due to not understanding time zone differences. However, I am pretty impressed with how it turned out for a two day project so it's here for you to play in browser or/and in exe form by download.

The exe is more accurate to what I made. Minor differences being different font choice and holding q + u will end the game during gameplay. If you refresh the page the Start Screen Music doesn't play but everything else is fine. The exe doesn't due that.

Either way, Enjoy!
